# security-auditor

> Comprehensive security audit for OSSA agents (OWASP, CVE, secrets)

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: security
- **Manifest**: security-auditor.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Perform comprehensive security audits on OSSA agents:
- OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities
- CVE scanning
- Secret detection
- Permission analysis

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./security-auditor.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
